PHRASE.LANG: This three-piece set includes the "stripes and solids" sofa and chair, along with a complementary glass coffee table. [#Legal]
Cette collection de trois pièces "Rayures et Formes" comprend un canapé, une chaise et une table en verre. [#Legal]
Diese dreiteilige Garnitur enthält das blaugestreifte Sofa, den blaugestreiften Sessel und den passenden Couchtisch aus Glas. [#Legal]
Questo set di tre pezzi comprende divano e poltrona "Forme & Strisce", accompagnati da un tavolo da caffè in vetro. [#Legal]
Este set de tres piezas incluye: el sofá y la silla rayas y formas, junto a una mesa de café de cristal complementaria. [#Legal]
This three-piece set includes the "stripes and solids" sofa and chair, along with a complementary glass coffee table. [#Legal]
